text: The Bahamas competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, United States. The nation returned to the Olympic Games after participating in the American-led boycott of the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==Athletics== ;Men ;Track & road events {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%"
